body_html:
Turns out I had a typo in the monotonic bahdanau call, pasted the scalar num_units for the memory field too.
Indeed, the alignment images look quite different for several values of score_bias_init and sigmoid_noise, will have to search for the optimal values.
Would -1.0 and 0.5 (0.0 in test) respectively be a good starting point ? Cannot tell what would be an appropriate range right now.
body_text:
Turns out I had a typo in the monotonic bahdanau call, pasted the scalar num_units for the memory field too.
Indeed, the alignment images look quite different for several values of score_bias_init and sigmoid_noise, will have to search for the optimal values.
Would -1.0 and 0.5 (0.0 in test) respectively be a good starting point ? Cannot tell what would be an appropriate range right now.
body:
Turns out I had a typo in the monotonic bahdanau call, pasted the scalar `num_units` for the `memory` field too.
Indeed, the alignment images look quite different for several values of `score_bias_init` and `sigmoid_noise`, will have to search for the optimal values.
Would -1.0 and 0.5 (0.0 in test) respectively be a good starting point ? Cannot tell what would be an appropriate range right now.
